name: New Worlds
description:
New Worlds is an adventure (and soon to be) horror game made in RPG Maker MV about a girl who wants to explore the world in search of answers and power.

Right now this is a little demo that was made during the My First Game Jam!

This current demo doesn't have any blood or horror stuff in it, just a mention of blood and mild language.

EDIT: Fixed the bug that stopped you from progressing when your Mum is giving you a plant! -3-''''
